Role Overview
We are seeking detail-oriented generalists to join a large-scale AI training and data annotation project. You will play a vital role in improving next-generation AI systems by labeling and structuring diverse datasets according to predefined guidelines and taxonomies.

Key Responsibilities
- Analyze and synthesize information from high-volume datasets
- Annotate and categorize text, images, and other data per detailed instructions
- Apply predefined rubrics and taxonomies to generate consistent, structured outputs
- Identify and flag inconsistencies or ambiguities in datasets
- Maintain quality and accuracy standards throughout annotation tasks

Ideal Qualifications
- Based in the United States
- Strong critical reasoning, comprehension, and written communication skills
- Ability to work independently and follow structured guidelines precisely
- Prior experience in data annotation or taxonomy-based labeling is a plus

Work Details
- Fully remote and asynchronous — work from anywhere, anytime
- Flexible workload (~20 hours/week typical)
- Independent contractor engagement

Compensation: $45/hour (for U.S.-based contractors)
